member.name: T:VerifyXunit.DerivePathInfo
member.summary: Signature for deriving a custom path information for `.verified.` files.
member.param: The directory of the project that the test was compile from.
The class the test method exists in.

member.name: M:VerifyXunit.Verifier.DerivePathInfo(VerifyXunit.DerivePathInfo)
member.summary: Use custom path information for `.verified.` files.
member.remarks: This is sometimes needed on CI systems that move/remove the original source. To move to this approach, any existing `.verified.` files will need to be moved to the new directory
member.param: Custom callback to control the behavior.

member.name: M:VerifyXunit.Verifier.UseProjectRelativeDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Use a directory relative to the project directory for storing for `.verified.` files.

member.name: M:VerifyXunit.Verifier.UseSourceFileRelativeDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Use a directory relative to the source file directory for storing for `.verified.` files.

member.summary: Verifies the contents of . Differs from passing to Verify(object? target) which will verify the full path.
